bibl.title: From Coptic to Arabic in the Christian Literature of Egypt (7th-11th centuries).
bibl.note: Coptic literature in late Byzantine and early Islamic Egypt. - Anonymous and collective writings. - First steps in Christian Arabic literature. - S훮w카rus Ibn al-Muqaffa': a singular star in the tenth century. - Further developments: the eleventh and early twelfth century. - Epilogue.
bibl.seg: Adel Y. Sidarus, From Coptic to Arabic in the Christian Literature of Egypt (7th-11th centuries).

Coptic literature in late Byzantine and early Islamic Egypt. - Anonymous and collective writings. - First steps in Christian Arabic literature. - S훮w카rus Ibn al-Muqaffa': a singular star in the tenth century. - Further developments: the eleventh and early twelfth century. - Epilogue.
